Name: Zoning, Herkimer-Williams, Brooklyn (C 250287 ZSK)
Title: Application number C 250287 ZSK (Herkimer-Williams) submitted by Broadway Junction Partners LLC, pursuant to Section 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for the grant of a special permit pursuant to Section 74-161 of the Zoning Resolution to modify the size limitation for Use Group VI (Retail Trade Establishment), in connection with a proposed commercial development on property located on the easterly side of Williams Place between Herkimer Street and East New York Avenue (Block 1577, Lots 1, 7, 56, and 58), in C6-4 and M1-6 Districts, Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 5, Council District 37.

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
